channel.title: Notification
channel.description:
I'm using the Torvapk client and source. It's working great and my friends are online, but I need to change the login notification.
It says "Welcome to Torvapkz" and I'd like it to say mine but like..I can't find the coding to change it.
Can anyone give me help on where the code for the notification, that pops up is at?

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @batistaboy4 batistaboy4
item.description:
@batistaboy4 wrote:

Client.java

public void initialize() { mymessage(); synchronized (this) { sendMessage("Alert##(YOUR MESSAGE)##(ANOTHER MESSAGE");

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

jwags:

or u can just go to client.java (if its in the text box) in source and just ctrl + f, then what u want to change, or u can just do ctrl + h, put in the old server name, replace it with yours, and it will replace all his, but be careful some stuff could be important, make sure u know what ur doing.

Z-File searcher will search all files in that folder at once… makes it a little easier if it is NOT in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @kirby1996 kirby1996
item.description:
@kirby1996 wrote:

client.java server sided ofc

search the message for the current alert and change it =]

Read full topic

item.description:
@merk_u_zerk wrote:

When you open the server folder theres a thing called announcements, open that and if its not there serch in client.java server sided.
